name: Whispers: Interactive Stories
description:
Pick your immersive romance stories where YOU control what happens!
Welcome to Whispers: the story game with best collection of romance, drama, fantasy, suspense and more, where you can have extraordinary immersive story experience.

"Whispers let you explore different lives by making choices in every story. Falling in love with handsome billinaires or muscular bodyguard? Discovering hidden truth or inherit a huge legacy? Exploring the mysterious wonderland or to be a lost princess?
Each choice can affect the whole story-Do it wisely and have fun!"

Features:
-Simple to control and free to play.
-Customize your hair, outfits and looks.
-Fall in love with your favourite guys and girls.
-Enjoy different genres from our constantly growing library with weekly chapers updates.
-Beautiful characters ande scenes provide a immersive visual story experience.

What story will you start with?

DANCE TO THE TOP · Reality Show
A world-famous dance competition as well as TV reality show awaits, with your crush and idol as your mentor! The competition will be hot and hungry. Will you seduce, or sabotage? Can you handle the heat and Dance to the Top?

-Roleplay as a girl or a guy.
-Customize yourself with fantasy dancing dresses.
-Four perfect lovers wait for you to pick.

THE WITNESS · Suspense
Your life is turned around after witnessing a mob murder, but with the case months away, how will you survive to trial and manage a new life, sexual liaisons, shadowy figures, and demons of the past out to get you?

-Experience the unique Witness Protection
-Investigate a deep mystery with twists you won't see coming!

No matter you are a big fan of urban romance, drama, reality show, fantasy, young adult or other genres, you will definitely find what you love in Whispers!

Download Whispers right now to find more unforgettable stories and chapters!
Weekly updates on Thursday!
